misuses.misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
misuses.description: The use of HMAC-MD5 as a cryptographic algorithm is considered broken and should not be used in production environments. It is recommended to use a more secure algorithm such as SHA-256 or greater.
misuses.recommendation: Replace HmacMD5 with a more secure algorithm such as SHA-256 or greater.
